name: Toy Box Pipe
description:
Toy Box Pipe is a simple puzzle game where you have to arrange pipe segments and use water to extinguish fire.

You can play online in Lexaloffle

The game was developed for the Toy Box Jam 2019 with the theme "FLOW". Credits for all assets can be found in the jam page. You can load the launche with all jam submissions here.

Features:

  • Sokoban-like puzzles with push, pull and water flow.
  • 20 levels with various mechanics

Hint: if at any point you are stuck you can open the menu in the world map and unlock all levels.
